method: Mix the mayonnaise and pesto together in a bowl. Gently stir in the shredded chicken. Fill the rolls with the chicken mixture and top with some rocket.
ingredients: 3-4 tbsp mayonnaise,  1-2 tbsp pesto,  3 cooked skinless chicken breast, shredded,  handful rocket,  6 granary or seeded bread rolls, sliced horizontally, lightly buttered.
